= WikiEducator Package =

A proof of concept Python 2.x CGI tool that can package a
[http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Collection collection]
of pages from [http://WikiEducator.org/ WikiEducator] in IMS
Content Package or IMS Common Cartridge formats for use in a
learning management system (LMS).

It was inspired by [http://eXeLearning.org/ eXe], the eLearning
XHTML editor. WikiEducator uses many of the same pedagogical
templates and extends the eXe concept by providing

* collaborative editing
* public repository of resources

It requires the
[http://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/ Beautiful Soup] HTML
parser and manipulation tool.
